i have twelve kids.
I'm grilling a lot of meat for my family this weekend.
i am a secretary.

participant_2.background:
I would brag about my friends being so supportive while I'm in school.
i love huge paintings.
My moped is the envy of everyone on my block because it's so colorful and unique.
My worst nightmare was when my entire short film was deleted by accident.
my favorite meal is steak.

content.text: Hey, how are you doing today?
I'm great! I have a lot of work to do, but I'm excited to get started.
What kind of work do you do?
I'm a student at the Art Institute of Chicago. I'm studying film production.
Oh cool, what are you working on right now?
I'm working on a short film about a group of friends who go on a road trip.
That sounds really cool! What's the name of the film?
It's called "The Road Trip."
I love the name! I'm sure it's going to be great.
Thanks! I'm really excited about it.
What's your favorite thing about being a student at the Art Institute of Chicago?
My favorite thing is the people I've met. Everyone is so supportive and talented.
That sounds amazing! I'm glad you're having a great time.
Thanks! I am.
What do you want to do after you graduate?
I want to work in the film industry. I'm hoping to get a job as an assistant director or a production assistant.
That sounds like a great goal! I'm sure you'll be successful.
Thanks! I appreciate that.
I'm going to go now. It was nice talking to you!
It was nice talking to you too! Bye!
